releaseNotes: New Feature: Two-factor Authentication
New Setting: Restore all warning messages
New Feature: Scrolling in HP (buttons ‘Right’, ‘Left’ - switching by protocols buttons ‘Up’, ‘Down’ - switching between historical visits)
New Feature: Ability to change HP order in user settings (added Move Down and Move Up buttons)
New Feature: New Dicoms trimming logic (MG).
New Feature: New Dicoms trimming logic (MG).
New Feature: New Dicoms trimming logic (MG).
New Addition: Transport Layer Security version check.
New Addition: Tag “Study Description” added to Hanging Protocols.
New Feature: Show Ellipse Center (by default) (Workarea settings - Other Settings - Display settings).
Bugfix: Option to maintain cineloop playback speed between series.
New Feature: Show Ellipse Center (by default) (Workarea settings - Other Settings - Display settings).

Bugfix: Option to maintain cineloop playback speed between series.
New Setting: «Use Cardiology View Grouping». This setting sorts Dicoms by 'View name' tag. The setting will be enabled by default.
New Feature: New parameters to Hanging Protocols for Stress Echo procedures are 'View name' and 'Stage name' tags.
